trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> types to UI Automation.
Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.

When overridden in a derived class, creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for a data item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items"></xref> collection of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref>.
The data item that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref>.
The new <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> created.
Returns an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.
The item to get an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified object.

Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
This method is called by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren"></xref>.
The collection of child elements.

Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.
One of the enumeration values.
The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ScrollViewerAutomationPeer"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref>.

Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized.

`true` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects for child items that are not virtualized; `false` if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer"></xref> should return <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> objects all child items.
Retrieves an element by the specified property value.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IItemContainerProvider> interface.
The item in the container after which to begin the search.
The property that contains the value to retrieve.
The value to retrieve.
The first item that matches the search criterion; otherwise, `null` if no items match.
